summary: Sick of Draugrs speaking in Dovah language all the time? Exploring dungeons got boring? This mod changes Draugr's voice to the mortal one. And it just gets better, because they swear a lot. Music to the ear isn't it.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=lime][b]Swearing Draugrs - Sound Replacement[/b][/color][/size]

[color=lime][b]=Description=[/b][/color]

Sick of Draugrs speaking in Dovah language all the time? Exploring dungeons got boring? This mod changes Draugr's voice to the mortal one. And it just gets better, because they swear a lot. Music to the ear isn't it.

Show no mercy to these undead [s]wankers[/s] warriors. They definitely deserve a good kicking.

Added a Preview video. It only shows about 60% of all sound varieties though.

[youtube]W03rA-Izpr0[/youtube]


Feel free to comment about the mod so it can be improved in the future.

[color=lime]=Installation=[/color]

Extract the files in the archive to your Skyrim folder.

[color=lime]=Uninstallation=[/color]

Delete "draugr" folder in SkyrimDatasoundfxnpc

[color=lime][b]=Changelog=[/b][/color]

[list=1]v 1.6
[*]Improved sound quality from 32kbps to 512kbps bitrate
[*]Added Fade in / Fade out for the sounds
[*]Other sound enhancements
[*]Removed some cheesy lines
[*]Added more sound variety
[/list]

[list=1]v1.0
[*]Initial Release
[/list]
author: Vladdyvostok
